analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya slob ma'i gnas ldar bcings la /

analyzed: de la dbang bcu gcig nyid la /

analyzed: ji ltar na dbang bcu bskur zhes gsungs she na /

analyzed: kha cig na re 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags gong ma ni /
translated: Some say: The above mantra of the universal monarch

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni h'um dang a'a: las byung ba'i rdo rje dang dril bu rang rang gi sngags bzlas pa slob ma'i lag tu byin la /

analyzed: 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ste /

analyzed: 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs te //

translated: After that, he gives the seven precious substances and the seven secondary precious substances: shoes, swords, hides, houses, gardens, clothes, and cushions.üîΩHe also gives the auspicious symbols: the endless knot, the lotus,

analyzed: der yang bkra shis brgyang pa 'don zhing /

translated: Here, after going for refuge and performing the seven branches such as making offerings, and generating the awakening mind, the mundane initiations are conferred, not the others. Therefore, it says, ‚Äúin order to destroy sin.‚Äù

analyzed: kha cig na re tshig 'di ni dbang bcu bskur zhes pa'i rjes su sbyor ro zhes zer ro //

analyzed: de'i 'og tu dbang bcu gnyis rnams spyin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that the Compendium of Principles Tantra teaches that after that, the twelve initiations are conferred.

original: 'di las ni sgrub par byed pa med de 'di ni lugs gzhan kho na yin pas so //
analyzed: 'di las ni sgrub par byed pa med de 'di ni lugs gzhan kho na yin pas so //
translated: This is not the case, because this is a different system.

analyzed: rgyud rnams las rang rang gi lugs kyi dbang bskur ba mi 'dra ba rab tu mang ba 'byung ba yang gcig tu ma thun par bya dgos par 'gyur la /
translated: The many different initiations of their own systems that are taught in the various tantras must be made to fit together.

analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang phyi ma'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i dbang rab tu mang po bsnan pa yin par yang gsungs so //

translated: Here, the first initiation is the cause for keeping in mind the qualities of the stage of buddhahood, and it symbolizes the presence of the cause for that.

analyzed: gnyis pa ni de thob ba'i rgyu tshogs gnyis la sbyor ba'o //

analyzed: gsum pa ni tshogs sogs pa ni 'gro ba'i spyi bos bkur ba'o zhes bsngags pa'o //
translated: The third is the praise, ‚ÄúThose who have gathered the collections are honored by the heads of transmigrating beings.‚Äù

analyzed: bzhi pa ni tshogs sogs pa rnams mi zhum bar bya ba dbugs dbyung ba'o //

analyzed: lnga pa ni ma zhum pa de rgyal ba'i phrin las byed par ston pa'o //
translated: The fifth is the teaching that those who are not discouraged will perform the deeds of a conqueror.

original: drug pa ni yan lag de dag gis bdag nges par mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes yid ches par byed pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa ni yan lag de dag gis bdag nges par mtshan 'di zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro zhes yid ches par byed pa'o //
translated: The sixth is the creation of confidence in those branches, ‚ÄúBy these branches, I will definitely become the Tathagata named so-and-so.‚Äù

analyzed: bdun pas ni sangs rgyas su gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis gdul bya gdul bar mtshan pa'o //
translated: The seventh shows that having become a Buddha, he converts those to be converted by means of the miracles of psychic power and of instruction.

original: brgyang pas ni rjes su ba stan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar byed pas mtshan pa'o //üîΩdgu pas ni bla na med @296a * //
analyzed: brgyang pas ni rjes su ba stan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar byed pas mtshan pa'o // dgu pas ni bla na med @296a * //

original: pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ni de nyid yin no zhes 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid la sred pa chad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba chen po ni de nyid yin no zhes 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid la sred pa chad par byed pa'o //
translated: The ninth shows that he is the unexcelled great universal monarch, and cuts off craving for worldly sovereignty.

original: bcu pas ni mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: bcu pas ni mtha' gnyis su ma lhung ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas bar ston pa'o //

analyzed: bcu gcig pas ni de'i tshe gsang ba gsum bsam gyis mi khyab par shes par byed pa'o //
translated: The eleventh shows that at that time he makes known the inconceivability of the three secrets.

analyzed: bcu gnyis pas ni slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dus kun du  thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel par ba stan pa ste /
translated: The twelfth shows that he is always connected with method and wisdom in the periods of training and no-more-training.

analyzed: des na 'di dag tsam gyis don yongs su rdzogs ba yin pas lugs gzhan gyis 'di gang du yang drang bar mi bya'o //

translated: Therefore, the empowerment of the remaining empowerments and the superior deity empowerment of the flower garland are given first. This is the common procedure.

analyzed: de'i phyir dbang ni 'di rnams go rims dang grangs rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa kho na ltar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the empowerments should be given in just the sequence and number as they are explained in the tantra.

analyzed: rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang tsam gyis lung gi don zab mo gud du drang bar mi bya ste /

analyzed: yid ches lung dang mi ldan par //

analyzed: chos rnams ston par byed pa na //

analyzed: mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis //

analyzed: bdag kyang chud gson gzhan chud gson //
translated: I have wasted myself and wasted others.

original: zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: Thus he speaks.

translated: In the context of the supramundane initiation, some masters say that the jewels and minor jewels, and the auspicious objects and minor auspicious objects, are given at the end.

original: gdul bya spros pa spyod pa dag gi ngor ni /
analyzed: gdul bya spros pa spyod pa dag gi ngor ni /
